title: Robot Monster Vocalizations Vol. 3
description: Robot Monster Vocalizations sound package with 228 high-quality monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/robot-monster-vocalizations-vol-3

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/a1qp3ummb918ybg/MSE%20-%20Robot%20Monster%20Vocalizations%20vol.3.pdf?dl=0


The collection contains 14 voice actions, including 228 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 4 sounds of breath
  • 36 deaths
  • 8 groans
  • 32 growls
  • 8 idle and speech sounds
  • 8 sounds of jumping and action
  • 4 sounds of laughing
  • 24 pains
  • 32 roars
  • 12 snarling sounds
  • 12 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 12 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


Vocalizations are perfect for voicing both robot characters and enemy characters and bosses. All voice samples are made in a dark style.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


This pack is included in the Bundles:

Ultimate Creature Vocalizations Bundle

Ultimate Horror Game SFX Bundle


You can also check out the biggest Bundle with 20,855 sounds - Ultimate Game Sound Effects Bundle


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 228 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 14 voice actions
  • 124 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 64 voice samples of the pain type
  • 40 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 228

Number of Audio Cues: 228

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 06 minutes 16 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
